title: Create kit lookup API endpoint (by QR/code)
body:
API endpoint to retrieve kit details by scanned QR or manually entered code.
- Security: Validate access/auth
- Return relevant kit data for custody actions

title: Build kit registration & QR association frontend flow
body:
Implement the React UI for registering a new kit and associating it with a QR code.
- Use html5-qrcode for scanning
- Manual code entry fallback
- Link frontend to backend registration endpoint

title: Implement QR code generation for kits (backend)
body:
Generate unique QR/alphanumeric code for each kit and serve as PNG/SVG via API.
- Use python-qrcode or similar
- Store kit QR codes in database
- Endpoint to retrieve QR

title: Build soft warnings system (custody)
body:
Surface non-blocking warnings like overdue returns, incomplete kits, extended custody duration.
- Backend detects warning states
- Frontend displays warnings in custody flows
- Document warning logic

title: Implement lost/found reporting
body:
Create reporting system for lost/found kits.
- API and frontend flow to report and clear lost/found status
- Record all actions as append-only events
- Soft warning on lost kit

title: Transfer custody flow
body:
Build transfer custody backend/frontend workflows.
- API for initiating/accepting transfer
- UI for user action and QR scan confirmation
- Log events and ensure correct role checks

title: Responsibility attestation system
body:
Implement responsibility attestation capture in custody flows (statement, checkbox, name confirmation, timestamp).
- Backend API stores attestation in event record
- Frontend UI for user to acknowledge responsibility
- Versioned statement handling

title: Check-out (off-site) flow with multi-role approval
body:
Build custody flow for off-site kit checkout with role and verified adult checks, plus Armorer/Coach approval.
- API endpoint for off-site checkout
- Frontend flow for approval
- Document flow and test cases

title: Check-out (on-prem) flow (backend & frontend)
body:
Build API and UI to support on-prem kit checkout for authorized user roles.
- API to record event, verify permissions
- Simple React UI to trigger checkout, scan QR

title: Create custody_events append-only table/model
body:
Design and create the append-only custody_events table to record all custody changes/actions.
- DB schema with correct foreign keys
- SQLAlchemy model and migration
- Document schema and audit requirements

title: Implement maintenance timeline view (frontend)
body:
Create UI showing maintenance history for each kit/item based on events.
- Use append-only events to build timeline
- Add filtering and details
- Link to export options

title: Show overdue maintenance as soft warnings
body:
Implement backend logic and frontend UI to show warnings for overdue/next-due maintenance.
- Display warnings in kit/item view
- Do not block actions, only inform
- Document warning calculation

title: Build open/close maintenance workflows (API & UI)
body:
Create API endpoints and React components to open/close maintenance events.
- Round count, parts replaced, notes
- UI for logging maintenance
- Validate user access (roles)
- Add reminders handling

title: Create maintenance_events table/model
body:
Design append-only maintenance_events table in PostgreSQL for kit/item maintenance logging.
- SQLAlchemy model and migration
- Document schema and relationships

title: Implement serial number encryption
body:
Encrypt firearm serial numbers at rest in the database and ensure not exposed via QR, exports, or frontend.
- Use field encryption (backend)
- Add tests verifying no unexpected leaks
- Document compliance strategy

title: Enforce append-only data integrity in backend
body:
Ensure all event tables (custody_events, maintenance_events) are append-only with no destructive update/delete operations.
- ORM/DB layer enforcement
- Add integration tests for integrity
- Document for auditors

title: Implement audit trail UI component
body:
Build React component that displays the full audit trail for any kit/item/user, leveraging event timeline API.
- Add search/filter/sort controls
- Link to export options
- Display warnings with context

title: Create event log export functionality (CSV/JSON)
body:
Create backend endpoints and React UI to export custody/maintenance event logs as CSV/JSON files for audit or incident response.
- Add export buttons in relevant views
- Document export format

title: Build event timeline API (by kit/item/user)
body:
Backend API endpoint that returns chronological list of all custody/maintenance events for a kit/item/user.
- Filterable by entity
- Used for audit views and reporting
- Document response format

title: Configure Railway deployment for backend & database
body:
Set up backend API and database deployment via Railway cloud platform.
- Link GitHub repo to Railway
- Setup environment variables
- Document deployment steps
- Enable automatic deployment on push

title: Configure Vercel deployment for frontend
body:
Create deployment pipeline for React frontend on Vercel.
- Connect GitHub repository with Vercel (auto-deploy on push)
- Add Vercel configuration files
- Document deployment steps in README

title: Set up PostgreSQL database schema
body:
Design initial database schema in PostgreSQL based on the application's major entities and relationships (users, kits, items, custody_events, maintenance_events).
- Create schema migration scripts
- Document each table's purpose
- Add initial migration to codebase

title: Initialize FastAPI backend with SQLAlchemy
body:
Create backend codebase using FastAPI and SQLAlchemy ORM.
- Set up Python virtual environment
- Add initial FastAPI skeleton
- Add README with dev setup
- Document basic API folder structure

title: Initialize React + Vite frontend with TailwindCSS
body:
Set up the frontend codebase using React (with Vite for fast development) and TailwindCSS for rapid styling.

- Create initial project skeleton (vite, react, tailwind)
- Add README with standard npm scripts
- Document dev setup steps

title: Implement roles and verified adult flag in frontend UI
body:
Create UI components to display and manage user role assignments and verified adult flags.
- Admin role can assign/change flags/roles
- Roles shown in user profile
- Verified status reflected in custody actions

title: Build JWT token authentication flow
body:
Implement JWT-based session handling for users after successful OAuth login.
- Issue JWTs from backend
- Store and validate JWTs in frontend
- Configure session expiry and refresh

title: Create user model and database table, including roles
body:
Design and create the user table/model in PostgreSQL including required fields, role assignments, and verified adult flag.
- User fields: id, email, provider, role, verified_adult
- Implement SQLAlchemy model
- Add migration scripts
- Document structure

title: Implement Microsoft OAuth integration (backend)
body:
Add Microsoft OAuth login flow to FastAPI backend.
- Use Authlib or python-social-auth
- Store user info after login
- Issue JWT for session management
- Document flow and testing

title: Epic: Initial Project Planning and System Architecture
body:
Establish the foundational planning and architecture for the WilcoSS Custody & Equipment Manager project. This includes reviewing the Product Requirements Document (PRD), defining epics, milestones, and the scope for v0.1.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Full PRD reviewed and key goals extracted
- Project milestones and prioritization identified for foundational release
- Major feature areas (authentication, custody, QR ops, audit, etc.) documented as epics
- Tech stack/architecture discussion scheduled as follow-up

---
**Parent Epic for project planning. All other epics should link as subtasks or children.**

title: Epic: Authentication & Identity Management
body:
Implement authentication and user management per PRD requirements.

### Scope
- OAuth login via Google and Microsoft
- Manual "Verified Adult" flag set by Admin
- Role assignment: Admin, Armorer, Coach, Volunteer, Parent

### Acceptance Criteria
- Users can sign in via OAuth (Google, Microsoft)
- Admin can assign roles and verified adult flag
- No child accounts or auth

---
**Sub-epic under project planning.**

title: Epic: QR-Based Operations and Kit Management
body:
Deliver QR-driven kit identification and fast check-in/check-out flows.

### Scope
- QR code generation and printing for kits
- Mobile web scanning (via camera)
- Manual code entry fallback
- Mobile-first UI/UX for scanning and actions

### Acceptance Criteria
- Kits can be linked with QR codes
- Users can scan and perform check-in/out quickly
- Fallback for manual entry present

---
**Sub-epic under project planning.**

title: Epic: Custody Event Management & Flow
body:
Enforce auditable custody event flows and approvals as described in the PRD.

### Scope
- Append-only custody event log
- Role/approval flows for on-prem and off-site custody
- Responsibility attestation
- Reporting of lost/found
- Warnings (soft, non-blocking)

### Acceptance Criteria
- All custody actions logged as events
- Role-based approvals and verification enforced
- Users can check in/out, transfer, report lost/found
- Warnings surfaced but do not block

---
**Sub-epic under project planning.**

title: Epic: Maintenance Tracking & Scheduling
body:
Track equipment maintenance, log events, and support soft warning flows.

### Scope
- Open/close maintenance events
- Notes, round count, parts replaced, reminders
- Timeline/audit log for maintenance

### Acceptance Criteria
- Maintenance can be tracked per kit/item
- Reminders for overdue/next-due maintenance (soft warning)
- Maintenance log included in kit/item audit trail

---
**Sub-epic under project planning.**

title: Epic: Data & Audit Trail Requirements
body:
Design and implement data model and audit flows for full traceability.

### Scope
- Append-only, reconstructable audit log per kit/item
- Export log in CSV/JSON
- No destructive edits; corrections are new events

### Acceptance Criteria
- Timeline visible in UI for any kit/item
- Export function delivers required fields per PRD
- Deletions and edits not allowed; everything is event-based

---
**Sub-epic under project planning.**
